title: Kangal Irandal Lyrics Subramaniapuram
stanzas:
Kangal irandaal
un kangal irandaal
ennai katti iluththai iluthaai
podhathena chinna sirippil
oru kalla sirippil
ennai thallivittu thalivittu
moodi maraithaai. (2)

pesa enni silanaal
arugil varuven
pinbu paarvai podhum
ena naan ninaippen
nagalvene.. maatri

kangal ezhudhum
iru kangal ezhudhum
oru vanna kavidhal
kadhal thaanaa
oru vaarthai illaiye
idhil osai illaiye
idhai irulilum
padithida mudigirathe.

iravum allaatha
pagalum allaatha
pozhudhugal unnodu
kaliyumaa

thodavum koodaatha
padavum koodaatha
idaiveli appodhu
kuraiyumaa

madiyinil saaindhida
thudikkudhe
marupuram naanamum
thadukkuthe
idhu varai yaaridamum
sollaatha kadhai.

Kangal irandaal
un kangal irandaal
ennai katti iluththai iluthaai
podhathena chinna sirippil
oru kalla sirippil
ennai thallivittu thalivittu
moodi maraithaai

karaigal andaatha
kaatrum theendaatha
manadhirukkum eppodhu
nulaindhittaai

udalum allaadha
uruvam kollaatha
kadavulai Â pol vandhu
kalandhittaai

unai andri veroru
ninaivillai.
ini indha oonuyir
enadhillai.

kangal ezhudhum
iru kangal ezhudhum
oru vanna kavidhal
kadhal thaanaa
oru vaarthai illaiye
idhil osai illaiye
idhai irulilum
padithida mudigirathe.

pesa enni silanaal
arugil varuven
pinbu paarvai podhum
ena naan ninaippen
nagarvene.. maatri

Kangal irandaal
un kangal irandaal
ennai katti iluththai iluthaai
podhathena chinna sirippil
oru kalla sirippil
ennai thallivittu thalivittu
moodi maraithaai
